To indicate if enumeration of data is in progress.

DataAccountDetails.description: Account details of the data to be transferred

dataAccountType.description: Account Type of the data to be transferred.

sharePassword.description: Password for all the shares to be created on the device. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

DataBoxAccountCopyLogDetails.description: Copy log details for a storage account of a DataBox job

copyVerboseLogLink.description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when LogCollectionLevel is set to Verbose.

DataBoxDiskCopyLogDetails.description: Copy Log Details for a disk

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the disk

bytesCopied.description: Bytes copied during the copy of disk.

percentComplete.description: Indicates the percentage completed for the copy of the disk.

values.description: Data copy failed. No data was copied.
No copy triggered as device was not returned.
The Device has hit hardware issues.
Data copy failed. The Device was formatted by user.
Data copy failed. Device metadata was modified by user.
Data copy failed. Storage Account was not accessible during copy.
Data copy failed. The Device data content is not supported.

preferredDisks.description: User preference on what size disks are needed for the job. The map is from the disk size in TB to the count. Eg. {2,5} means 5 disks of 2 TB size. Key is string but will be checked against an int.

disksAndSizeDetails.description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk size being used for the job. Is returned only after the disks are shipped to the customer.

passkey.description: User entered passkey for DataBox Disk job.

DataBoxDiskJobSecrets.description: The secrets related to disk job.

diskSecrets.description: Contains the list of secrets object for that device.

isPasskeyUserDefined.description: Whether passkey was provided by user.

devicePassword.description: Set Device password for unlocking Databox Heavy. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+
